titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that public servants should be commended for their dedication and continued service to the Nation during Public Service Recognition Week.
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that public servants should be commended for their dedication and continued service to the Nation during Public Service Recognition Week.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on May 1, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Commends government employees for their outstanding contributions and honors those who have given their lives in service to their country. Encourages efforts to promote public service careers at all levels of government.
